Beginning.Description: An odd man wearing a black suit approaches you and offers you $6666.66 in exchange for your mortal soul. Do you sign his contract? He seems nice enough.

Choices.FlavorText: That sounds like a great idea! Free money from a chump!

Beginning.Description: You and your boo are out for a night on the town. The $273.15 bill for your fancy restaurant shows up. How much do you tip?

Middle.Description: You just impulse bought a Telsa. Pick how you are financing it.

Choices.FlavorText: Get a car loan $49,000 principal, $1000 down, APR 15%.

End.Description: Your friend, Chester Cheetah, has invited you to Cheese World on the moon! How are you going to finance your trip?

Choices.FlavorText: Put it on your credit cards

End.InfoPage: Loss of employment is a difficult financial situation to find oneself in. With careful planning, however, it can be carefully navigated.
